articles.title: SA records 17493 new COVID-19 cases, 166 deaths - eNCA
articles.description: South Africa has recorded 17,493 new COVID-19 cases and 166 COVID-19 related deaths.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - South Africa has recorded 17,493 new COVID-19 cases.
The NICD said 166 COVID-19 related deaths have also been recorded.
This brings total fatalities to 59,258 to date.

articles.title: Akinwumi Adesina: G7 members agreed to allocate $100bn drawing rights for African countries - TheCable
articles.description: Countries in the G7 have agreed to allocate $100 billion special drawing rights (SDRs) to accelerate economic recovery in Africa.
articles.content:
Akinwumi Adesina, president of the African Development Bank (AfDB), says G7 countries have agreed to allocate $100 billion special drawing rights (SDRs) to Africa.

articles.author: Ray Ndlovu
articles.title: Rich countries deliberately kept vaccines from Africa, says telecoms billionaire Strive Masiyiwa - News24
articles.description: Strive Masiyiwa, the telecommunications billionaire tasked with helping the AU secure Covid-19 vaccines, said the shortage of doses on the continent was a consequence of deliberate action by the world’s richest nations.

articles.author: Pule Letshwiti-Jones
articles.title: DA, other political parties decline EFF invite for Friday’s march to Sahpra’s offices - News24
articles.description: News24 understands GOOD, Patriotic Alliance, One South Africa movement, Freedom Front Plus, Action SA and the DA will not be joining the march.
articles.content:
• Most political parties have declined the EFF's invitation to join their march on Friday.
  • The ATM says it will support the EFF, but the party's president will not be available.

articles.title: Ford Mustang Mach 1 touches down in SA - Pricing and specification announced - News24
articles.description: The Ford Mustang Mach 1 is the most track-focused Mustang yet, and it has officially touched down in South Africa.
articles.content:
• The all-new Ford Mustang Mach 1 has officially debuted in South Africa.
• The car is powered by a naturally aspirated 338kW V8 engine.
